str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a derivative of muo; a secret or 'mystery'.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make known, declare, know, discover. From a derivative of ginosko; to make known; subjectively, to know.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
An unveiling, uncovering, revealing, revelation. From apokalupto; disclosure.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From pro and grapho; to write previously; figuratively, to announce, prescribe.
